description:
[Mac] Don't call -[NSEvent touchesMatchingPhase:inView:] if we don't intend to recognize a gesture.

BUG=90408
TEST=On Leopard, swipe and don't crash.

Committed: http://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=93989
subject: [Mac] Don't call -[NSEvent touchesMatchingPhase:inView:] if we don't intend to recognize a gesture.
